origin.description: Primary authority or root source of the feed.

audience.description: Intended audience, standardized vocabulary (llm-agents, humans, multi-agent-systems).

trust_level.description: Declared trust level of the feed (internal, certified, gold, platinum).

scope.description: Domain of application for the feed (global, github-repositories, cloud-only, iot-devices).

description.description: Natural language human-readable summary of the feed.

keywords.description: Taxonomy-driven thematic tags for indexing and discoverability.

capabilities.description: List of action capabilities available to authorized agents.

recommended_behaviors.description: Best practices or ethical usage recommendations for interacting with the feed.
